biography.p1: Mi tío Jimmy Aksel Gil's solo project.
biography.p2:
Following a lengthy period of inactivity, they are preparing to record their first album after their time with the Madrid-based band Magnética. 
 The album is set to be released in the spring of 2024 and will be produced by Carly Yeah. 
 Until then, and while all the details are being finalized, a preview can be enjoyed at upcoming acoustic concerts and through social media channels.
biography.p3:
We are Mi tío Jimmy: 
 - Carly Yeah 
 - Fernando García 
 - Davit Benavent 
 - Aksel Gilff
